articles.author: Andrew Das
articles.title: Alex Morgan Leads USWNT Over Canada and Into Paris Olympics - The New York Times
articles.description: The Americans’ victory in the final of the Concacaf W Championship avenged a bitter loss to the Canadians at last summer’s Tokyo Olympics.
articles.content: The victory was the second major goal achieved by the Americans in Mexico, in a tournament that served as a qualifier for both the 2023 World Cup and the 2024 Olympics. The United States had sealed i… [+1009 chars]

articles.description: In an expansive new documentary, Don McLean talks about the much-discussed meaning of his enduring hit song
articles.content: A long, long time ago five decades to be exact America was roiled by wrenching generational showdowns, massive street protests, and a blazing array of social justice movements. Now, half a century la… [+10072 chars]

articles.title: Blame America: Why Canada's steep inflation isn't entirely our fault - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Most of Canada’s ‘excess inflation’ is being driven by U.S. fiscal policy, researchers at the Federal Reserve argue
articles.content:
